speaker: Doctor
text: So, can you tell me more about this episode of loss of consciousness you're experiencing? Was it sudden or did it come on gradually?

speaker: Patient
text: It happened really quickly, one minute I was standing in the bathroom, the next I was on the floor. I don't remember anything before that, and when I came to, everything seemed normal.

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you walk me through what happened right before you lost consciousness?
